Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection as a step in the process flow
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is immediately followed by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences that eventually lead to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to the frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurs before any reviewer-related reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that are not followed by any reviewer agreement (i.e., no SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that occur after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Ratio of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Checklist Completed across the entire log
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' occurs

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that ultimately result in SW-EIC Accept versus SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that are part of variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is followed within 7 days by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Fraction of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection appears more than once, indicating re-initiation of reviewer selection
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that precede at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to the total number of AE-involved activities (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers, SW-Awaiting AE Assignment)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that occurs in cases also containing Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Number of variants in which SW-Initial Reviewer Selection directly leads to a sequence ending in SW-Reviewer Agreed without intermediate declines or unavailability
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that occur in revision rounds (e.g., in cases containing RW-Initial Reviewer Selection later) versus initial submission rounds
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences per month to identify temporal patterns in reviewer assignment initiation
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
